noun.definition: A relationship between two things or situations, especially where one affects the other.
noun.example: Investigating the link between diet and cancer.

noun.definition: A ring or loop in a chain.
noun.example: A chain is only as strong as its weakest link.

verb.definition: Make, form, or suggest a connection with or between.
verb.example: Rumors linked his name with the scandal.

usage_examples: The investigation revealed a link between the two crimes.
The new bridge will link the island to the mainland.
